title: Calling Roles for Normal Games and Connection Timing.
body:
Does anyone seem to know why on Normal games that what is shown on somebody's screen as far as the chat log is concerned is not always right?

It seems that just because person A sees that they called the role they wanted it doesn't mean that person B saw the same thing. There was a situation today where I called a role and on my screen it showed first, but somebody else said that they got it. So I asked the other team members and one said me and the other one said the other person.
This leads me to wonder why is this the case? Is it because of connection speed or something? Also is there anything that can be done to fix the problem.

replies.body:
That's just people connecting to the chat at different times. It sucks, because Riot seem to have done nothing in regard to messages not going through. Hell, in the coding it's possible to send a message but have no one receive it due to a temporary drop in internet connection (it does not save to RAM and send when possible, it just won't send.

This is a design flaw in the game, something which cannot be fixed.
